data: TM Factor Replacement Other (Factor VII / Factor XI / Factor XIII) (Module)
50 mL, IV, as directed, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 1 doses or times, drug form: bag
Orders expire 5 days from order date and time
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion
Requires approval from Health Canada Special Access Program Contact: TMS/Adult Bleeding Disorder Program before ordering
